Uses of Class
tripleplay.game.trans.AbstractTransition

  • Packages that use AbstractTransition 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.game.trans  

    • Uses of AbstractTransition in tripleplay.game.trans

      Classes in tripleplay.game.trans with type parameters of type AbstractTransition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTransition<T extends AbstractTransition<T>>
      A base class for transitions that handles duration and the PITA machinery to case return values to the right type.
      Subclasses of AbstractTransition in tripleplay.game.trans 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FadeTransition
      Fades the new screen in front of the old one.
      class  FlipTransition
      Flips the current screen over, revealing the new screen as if it were on the reverse side of the current screen.
      class  InterpedTransition<T extends InterpedTransition<T>>
      Handles shared code for transitions that use an interpolation.
      class  PageTurnTransition
      Opens the current screen like the page of a book, revealing the new screen beneath.
      class  SlideTransition
      Slides the old screen off, and the new screen on right behind.
